entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
